translations: n.爆震音；卡答卡答的故障声音；敲的声音
v.敲，敲打；相碰，碰撞；把……撞击成（某种状态）；敲动，打破；打，凿（洞）（knock 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Somebody was knocking on the window.
He burst into the room without knocking.
sentences.translation: 他没敲门就闯进了屋子。

sentences.sentence: He marched into the kitchen without knocking.
sentences.translation: 他没敲门就快步走进了厨房。
